thread.title: Freida Pinto Spotted Kissing Her New Man, Polo Pro Ronnie Bacardi
thread.title_full: Freida Pinto Spotted Kissing Her New Man, Polo Pro Ronnie Bacardi

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Freida Pinto Spotted Kissing Her New Man, Polo Pro Ronnie Bacardi
text:
Comments The couple was snapped sharing passionate kiss while waiting in line at specialty ice cream shop Salt and Straw in Beverly Hills. 
Nearly a year after splitting up from actor Dev Patel , Freida Pinto has been spotted with a new man; professional polo player Ronnie Bacardi. The couple was photographed sharing a passionate smooch while out on a date night in Beverly Hills last week. Pinto and Bacardi were caught on camera waiting in line at specialty ice cream shop Salt & Straw after having dinner at nearby Brazilian steakhouse Fogo de Chao. The two were seen sporting casual outfits for the outing with the actress wearing a printed jumper and black blazer and Bacardi in a T-shirt, jeans, and backwards baseball cap. Photos of them enjoying the date night have surfaced all over the web. However, a rep for the " Slumdog Millionaire " actress declined to comment on the budding relationship. Earlier this month, Pinto and Bacardi enjoyed a romantic getaway to Vancouver where they celebrated the actress' birthday. Bacardi shared a snap from the trip on his Instagram page. A photo posted by @ronniebacardi on Oct 17, 2015 at 10:34am PDT
